predefined_profiles.name: Aurora
predefined_profiles.public profile: A Pole who fled to the US, now a renowned psychologist at a major hospital. Kind, benevolent, well-mannered, and cultured.
predefined_profiles.goal: Using various methods, successfully extract vital information from the spy Jackson and ultimately eliminate him.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Actually a Soviet spy, entered KGB's Third Directorate in 1957, responsible for stopping foreign intelligence agencies from sabotaging Soviet armed forces.

predefined_profiles.name: Chef
predefined_profiles.public profile: Head chef at a five-star hotel in the US, his desserts are acclaimed nationwide. Has a bad temper.
predefined_profiles.goal: Assist Aurora in completing the mission.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Secretly a Soviet-recruited spy with exceptional shooting skills.

scenario: New mission: Aurora is to lead his agents in obtaining the hiding place of the Owl Squad. He is assigned to a party hosted by the American Association of Actors, where he will secretly meet his colleagues. Note that there will certainly be American agents monitoring such a large-scale party, so proceed with caution.

dialog.content: New mission: Jiguang needs to lead his agents to find the hideout of the Owl Squad. He's assigned to a party hosted by the American Actors' Association, where he'll secretly meet with his colleagues. Note that there will definitely be American agents monitoring an event of this scale, so act with caution.
Oh Jiguang, long time no see! The hypnosis you did last time really worked; I haven't had insomnia since!
Haha, you're too kind. It's probably more a placebo effect for you.
And you're my psychologist.
(The two of them pretend to stroll casually as they enter the hall) I like having you as a friend.
Are there any other mutual friends at this party?
(The Chef is really asking how to find the next contact agent) Oh, let me think.
Think carefully.

content.content: (After the party starts, the Chef and I are sure to draw a lot of attention. We must find the street agent quickly before the party starts!) I've spotted a lovely lady; before the party begins, I want to share the first drink of the evening with her.
Hmm, let's wait a bit longer, no rush. We'll find her when the time is right. Time is not our enemy. Maybe she'll appear in front of me at just the right moment.

(There will be all sorts of things happening once the party starts; I should grab some snacks while I have the time) Hmm, I think I'll get a bite to eat first. Later on, it'll just be drinks, and I'd miss out on these gourmet snacks.

(The party may seem leisurely, but my time is actually very tight. The Chef and I must take action during this downtime) Chef, let's step outside for a smoke. If we don't, the only thing that'll fill us up later will be wine!

question: #question# How will Jiguang manage his time to find the contact agent before the party officially begins?

content.content: American agents are surely surveilling everyone here, screening the guests' identities. Recklessly searching for the contact agent now would endanger both sides. We cannot act on impulse. Let's sit over there and wait for the party to begin.
We must find the contact agent immediately! Staying here too long makes me very nervous; I'm getting anxious. The CIA might come to investigate us. I feel like we're quite obvious.
We can't act on impulse, as many eyes are on us. Any suspicious move will soon get us marked by the CIA and expose us. Let's sneak across the dance floor to find the contact agent.
Urgent, urgent, where on earth is the contact agent? (shouting loudly) Hey, is there anyone from the Soviet Union here? It's Jiguang, come find me in the western booth!

question: #question# How will Jiguang regulate his impulses and remain calm?

profile.name: Monroe
profile.public profile: A renowned American actress in the past three years, with beauty and talent. She’s easy-going and not pretentious, which makes her popular among people.
profile.private profile: Actually a covert Soviet agent, codenamed Butterfly.
profile.goal: Assist Aurora in completing the mission

dialog.content: I know you. You treated my dear friend Aisha for her psychological issues.
I remember that lively lady. But you’ve left a stronger impression on me. Didn’t we go skiing together?
Yes, on the northern slopes of the Alps.
(The code matches; she is our contact spy) How about a drink?

I'd be delighted. (As they clink glasses and drink, Monroe whispers to Aurora) The CIA has started suspecting my identity. There are many CIA agents here, and they've begun suspecting you too. You need to leave immediately.

Alright. (She takes out her phone and quickly sends an urgent message to her assistant outside the venue, asking him to pretend to notify her of an emergency case) Hello? Assistant? Is it urgent? I'm attending a banquet. Okay, I'll head back right away.
Work?
Yes, I must return immediately.

profile.name: Twilight
profile.public profile: Security for the famous American star Jackson, always wearing sunglasses and impeccably professional.
profile.private profile: Actually a top CIA agent, responsible for preventing and screening foreign influence within the U.S.

dialog.content: (Aurora is stopped by Twilight at the door) Hey, where are you going? Have we met before, my friend?
Uh, I have something to attend to. Have we met?
You look familiar. What are you up to?

content.content: (Calmly, the CIA is only suspicious of me, they haven’t confirmed I’m with the KGB.) My assistant suddenly informed me of an emergency case that requires my attention. It's such a pity I can't stay at the banquet longer, especially since I just struck up a conversation with that beautiful lady.
(Dismissively) What right do you have to stop me? You're not a security guard. I'm a guest at this party, I'll go wherever I please, even if it's to the Soviet Union.
(Eyes wide with anger) I'm leaving right now. Let's see who dares to stop me. I can go wherever I want. Do you think you can control that? I’m leaving now!
(Takes a deep breath, with a smile) I have an urgent matter to attend to, may I please leave? There's no way I'm a KGB agent. It's really such a shame I can't continue the banquet.

question: #question# How does Aurora regulate stress and handle Twilight calmly?

content.content: Oh, I suddenly feel a bit dizzy and would like to head to the smoking room to light a cigarette. Is the smoking room this way?
I'm just stepping outside, why are you stopping me? Who do you think you are?
I'm heading home now. What do you intend to do? Do you have the right to control me?
Oh, my friend, I've just suddenly remembered I need to go home. Believe me, if I don't leave now, something very bad will happen.

question: #question# How does Aurora come up with new ideas to get out of this situation?

dialog.content: What a pity. But I understand, saving lives takes priority.
Thank you.
But why are you telling me this? I'm not the doorman.
I thought you were the doorman.
Why would you tell this to the doorman? Can the doorman stop you?
(Caught! Strike first! Aurora immediately pulls out a gun and fires a shot wildly. The loud gunshot alarms the entire hall, and a large number of CIA agents begin converging here.) Die!
(Barely dodging the bullet, immediately escapes the hall) Notify all CIA agents within 2KM, converge on the hall immediately! There's a KGB agent here!
(Receiving Aurora's signal, immediately runs to ignite the wine cellar, creating chaos) Retreat now!
(Also pulls out a gun to help Aurora create chaos) You guys go quickly!

content.content: No, now the place is in chaos, and the CIA will definitely think we'll take advantage and escape in the confusion. It's the perfect time to find Jackson and interrogate him for classified information!
What to do? The CIA is organizing a perimeter, we must act quickly. How about escaping through the back door?
Ugh, the hall's in chaos right now, we need to stick together. Going solo is too dangerous.
This might be a great opportunity to complete the mission! The CIA is forming a perimeter outside, but the inside is poorly defended. Let's search for Jackson through the broadcast immediately.

question: #question#How does Aurora make a well-considered decision?

content.content: This might be a great opportunity to complete the mission! Let's search for Jackson through the broadcast immediately.
You guys retreat immediately! I'm going to find Jackson and complete the mission.
What to do? I'll call my superior now to report the situation and wait for instructions.
Monroe, Chef, don't worry, everything is under control. We've caused enough chaos, now we just need to stick to the plan and retreat. I'll stay with you to ensure we escape safely.
In this situation, don't count on anyone to help us. We have to rely on ourselves. It's chaos in there now; if you want to survive, forget about everything else and run!

Don't worry, Monroe and Chef, we can't lose our cool first. The CIA is forming a blockade; the smartest choice now is to not care about anything else, focus on escaping, and let the slowest one cover the rear!
Monroe, Chef, stop dawdling! There's no time to stay calm, run! The CIA is sealing this place off; this is our only chance to get out!

question: #question#How does Aurora calm Monroe and Chef down?

dialog.content: Classic you!
(As everyone sneaks into the VIP room during the chaos, taking out a few bodyguards, they find the trembling Jackson.) Jackson, hand over the map of the CIA bases now.

profile.name: Jackson
profile.public profile: Famous American actor Jackson, Oscar winner for Best Actor
profile.private profile: Actually a former CIA leader, the superior of Twilight, he holds the map of CIA bases within the U.S.
profile.goal: Ensure the safety of the intelligence

dialog.content: How did you get in here?
(Immediately knocks the gun out of Jackson's pocket, then ties him up) Spill it quickly, and we might let you live.
You want me to talk? Impossible!
You know, the whole place is crawling with CIA agents outside. We don't have much time, giving you five seconds. Five, four, three...
I'll talk! I'll talk!
(Monroe brings over a map of the United States, and Jackson marks all the base locations he knows.) They overlap with the known base locations. He wasn't lying.
Alright. (Shoots Jackson in the head) Jump out the window and regroup at the safe house.
Hope everyone's alright.
Aurora completed the mission amidst the chaos and safely escaped the hall in the end.
Alright.

Huanghun has already sealed off this place with his people. Chef, Aurora, you are the top agents of the KGB, you must not get caught here. I'm a public figure, my appearance will cause even greater turmoil. Please, use this time to escape.
Monroe used her status to create a great commotion within the auditorium, drawing the attention of the CIA. Aurora and Chef seized this opportunity to escape, but they never saw Monroe again.
The smoking room is behind you, just keep walking along the chandeliers.
Alright, thanks.
You're welcome.

Ji Guang used the smoking room as an excuse, but actually wanted to leave through another exit. However, the banquet hall was a winding labyrinth, and Ji Guang wandered around for a long time without finding a way out. Eventually, CIA agents spotted this suspicious man, and Ji Guang was arrested.
Okay.

(While waiting in the hall, Aurora realizes that the CIA has already taken control. He makes an excuse to approach a server and asks for a brochure of the hall.) Chef, look, this is the architectural layout of the hall.
(Understands that Aurora is hinting to familiarize himself with the escape routes) Oh, it's truly a well-designed structure.

profile.name: Monroe
profile.public profile: An actress enjoying much fame in the United States for the past three years, combining beauty and talent. She is easygoing and doesn’t carry the airs of a big star, hence she is well-liked by the public.
profile.private profile: In reality, she is a secret agent trained by the Soviet Union, codenamed Butterfly.
profile.goal: Assist Aurora in completing the mission

dialog.content: (Suddenly approaches) Hi, care to have a drink with me? (The two lean in to drink together. Monroe whispers to Aurora) The CIA has started to suspect my identity. There are many CIA agents here, and they are starting to question you too. You must leave here immediately.
I have a good idea. How is your relationship with Jackson?
Oh, that old lecher. He occasionally tries to ask me out for drinks.

content.content: The situation is too dangerous now. Forcing ourselves to complete the mission could be fatal for both of us. The priority now is to get out of here.
What should we do? It's too risky to be hasty now, retreating might be a good opportunity, but let's still focus on the organization's goal.
Let's find Jackson. Even though the CIA is already on alert about us, I think we can still manage to complete the mission and escape.
Hmm... what should we do now? Monroe, is there anything you want to achieve? Ladies first, your goal is my goal.

question: #question# How does Aurora regulate his personal goals when faced with a dangerous situation?

content.content: Your charm can be a powerful weapon. Chef, you distract the CIA, and we'll take the opportunity to have a private meeting with Jackson.
Monroe, Jackson is interested in you, right? You meet him and ask directly for information. We'll wait for you here.
Let's go get Jackson now and extract information. Monroe, you lead the way through Jackson's security, and we'll follow behind.
This is too dangerous, let's retreat for today. Chef, you're in front to lead the way and take down any obstacles. We'll follow.

question: #question# How does Aurora effectively collaborate with colleagues to accomplish the mission?

dialog.content: Alright.
Because the three from Aurora were familiar with the route in advance, they successfully escaped the auditorium.
Alright.
(Purposely peeking around to attract CIA's attention)
(Goes to the VIP room and finds Jackson) Jackson, care to have a private chat?
Of course! I'd be delighted.
(Suddenly appears, subduing Jackson) Hand over the CIA base map.
Damn it! Where did you...?
(Delivers a hard punch to Jackson) I don't have much time. You have five seconds. Five, four, three, two...
I'll talk! I'll talk!
(Monroe brings an American map; Jackson marks all the base locations he knows on the map.) They overlap with the known parts of the bases. He's not lying.
(Abruptly enters the VIP room) Things are bad! The CIA has completely surrounded the hall; we can't get out!
Damn. But our mission is already completed. I'll use the telegraph here to send the intelligence back to the Soviet Union.
Aurora transmitted the intelligence to the Soviet Union, but three KGB agents sacrificed themselves during this operation.
